resources.string: System Accessibility Hokwan ahorow a wɔde di dwuma wɔ saa ɔsom yi mu no yɛ :
"- Accessibility Overlay : de button a aniwa nhu bɛto anim camera cutout no ho ne ase a ɛbɛyɛ adwuma sɛ ɔkwan tiawa ama dwumadie a ɔdefoɔ apaw"
AccessibilityService API a Wɔda no adi
Minimized applications drawer a wɔde di dwuma
Sesa screen hann wɔ gyinapɛn a ɛba fam ne nea ɛkorɔn ntam
Botae a ɛkorɔn a ɛma hann
Ma mfoninitwa afiri no tokuru no nyɛ nkitahodi, bere a amanneɛbɔ anaa nsɛm a esisi biara nni hɔ a wɔbɛda no adi no, sɛ wobɔ mfoninitwa afiri a wɔatwa no so a, ɛbɛyɛ:
Toggle mfoninitwa afiri a wɔde tow kanea
Sɛnea wɔde excute adwuma a wɔapaw no
Bɔ nnwom a woadi kan abɔ
Toggle ringer mode (nnyigyei/mute). ɛnyɛ den sɛ wobɛma fon no ayɛ mum ansa na woada na woasan de akɔ nnyigyei tebea mu bere a woanyane no
Nneɛma a wɔde di akɔneaba wɔ ɔkwan a ɛnyɛ adwuma so
Fa screenshot bi na ɛyɛ adwuma
Sɛ obi de ne nsa ka biribi pɛnkoro
Kanyan adwuma bi a wɔyɛ no ɔtopae
Nea edi kan no ma accessibility service kwan no nyɛ adwuma
Di kan ma Dynamic Notification nyɛ adwuma bere a woawie nhyehyɛe no awie no
Di kan ma Notification kwan a wɔfa so kɔ hɔ no nyɛ adwuma
Ma app no ​​nyɛ adwuma wɔ akyi
Yɛsrɛ wo hwɛ wɛbsaet yi %1$s na hwɛ anammɔn a mfonini ahorow wom
Animate nea ɔde amena no mfonini
Fa Apps kɔla ahorow di dwuma wɔ :
Trɛw amanneɛbɔ ahorow a ɛho hia mu ara kwa
Amanneɛbɔ a ɛho hia ne nea wɔtaa gye sɛ amanneɛbɔ a ɛbɛba
Fi ase wɔ fullscreen mu bere a screen no yɛ Off
Yɛ camera cutout no sɛ bill shape
Blur notification content bere a wɔato device no mu.
Fa borders ka notification buttons ho
Kyerɛ amanneɛbɔ a atwa mfoninitwa afiri tokuru ho ahyia anaa mmeae ahorow wɔ screen so a nnɛyi ntadehyɛ pii a wubetumi apaw bi. ɛsan nso wobetumi de asi hɔ sɛ amanneɛbɔ LED kanea.
Fa camera tokuru no di dwuma sɛ battery level indicator sɛ circular line twa camera tokuru no ho hyia ɛsan nso kyerɛ chargeing nkɔso.
Kyerɛ mprempren a wɔreyɛ adwuma wɔ downloads ne uploads sɛ nkɔso kwan kurukuruwa a atwa kamera tokuru ho ahyia.
Dane mfoninitwa afiri no tokuru no ma ɛnyɛ ɔkwan tiawa bi a wɔde fa so! hyehyɛ nneyɛe a ɛde ne ho ma biribiara a wobɛka, klik mprenu, klik tenten ne swiping mfoninitwa afiri no afã abien no nyinaa.
Display animated icon gyina hɔ ma charge ne battery level
Sɛ wo swiping notification a wɔatrɛw mu no na wopopa a, ɛbɛpopa notification ankasa no nso
Sɛ wobɔ Dynamic Notification a, ɛbɛma:
Click bɛbue no na long click bɛtrɛw mu
Fa wallpaper kɔla ahorow di dwuma
Kɔla a wɔde yɛ app biara
Sɛ Dynamic Notification da adi a, fa status bar sie denam kɔla a ɛfata a wode bɛkata so na bere a Dynamic Notification event biara nni hɔ no kyerɛ status bar
Ɔdefoɔ data a wɔde di dwuma ho mpaemuka

"Mpɔtam hɔ kwan a wɔfa so kɔ hɔ. a worenkora wo data so anaasɛ worenkyɛ. dwumadie nyinaa a wɔyɛ wɔ mpɔtam hɔ wɔ koodu mu wɔ wo fon so. - Bisa paket a wɔde ahyɛ mu nyinaa sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wubetumi ayɛ Dynamic Notification kɔla wɔ app biara mu. "
Di kan yɛ Dynamic Notification adwuma afei ma Helper nyɛ adwuma afei ma Dynamic Notification nyɛ adwuma
Kyerɛw amanneɛbɔ a wɔagye no adi wɔ ɔkwan a wɔatrɛw mu, ɛyɛ ketewaa wɔ sikani kakraa bi akyi na wobetumi atew so, abue anaa wɔayi afi hɔ denam nkitahodi a wɔne no bɛyɛ so.
Efi ase a wɔayɛ no ketewaa bi
Kyerɛ amanneɛbɔ a wɔagye no wɔ ɔkwan a wɔayɛ no ketewaa bi so, a wobetumi atrɛw mu, abue anaa wɔaprapra mu denam nkitahodi a wɔne no bɛyɛ so.
Kyerɛ amanneɛbɔ a wɔagye no wɔ kratasin a wɔatrɛw mu sɛ ɛyɛ amanneɛbɔ a ɛho hia a, ne kratasin a wɔatew so ma amanneɛbɔ a ɛyɛ daa
Bere a Notification ada adi no
Pɛnkoro bere a wo nsa aka amanneɛbɔ no akyi
Pɛnkoro akyi a wo nsa aka amanneɛbɔ no, afei kyerɛ bio akyi bere biara a screen no benya unlocked anaa locked.
Ma saa app yi kwan ma ɛnkɔ so bere a wopɛ.
Ma system no kwan ma ɛnsiw saa app yi kwan ɛtɔ da bi a ɛnnyɛ adwuma.
Fa nsunsuanso di dwuma wɔ amanneɛbɔ a wɔatrɛw mu nso
Nsunsuanso ahorow a wɔde si hɔ
Nea edi kan no ma Helper no nyɛ adwuma afei eyi
Ɛho hia sɛ wɔma wotumi yɛ adwuma nnidiso nnidiso; di kan ma Dynamic Notification Helper nyɛ adwuma afei ma Dynamic Notification nyɛ adwuma
Paw app ahorow a wɔama ayɛ adwuma
A rate takes you a seconds kyerɛ ma me daa na ɛhyɛ me nkuran sɛ menyɛ styles ne features pii
Saa ara na ɛte sɛ screen ntwea so
Ɔkwan a wɔfa so de adwene si biribi so
Blur screen bere a wode nsa trɛw amanneɛbɔ bi mu de w’adwene si amanneɛbɔ a wɔatrɛw mu no so
Dim screen bere a wode nsa trɛw amanneɛbɔ bi mu de w’adwene si amanneɛbɔ a wɔatrɛw mu no so
Di Don Not Disturb mode no akyi
Hwɛ pii sen dawurubɔ bi na ama woanya nneɛma pii a wɔde bɛka wo ho
Fullscreen kwan a wɔfa so yɛ
Kɔla a ɛwɔ batere a ɛyɛ ma

Full screen style, ɛnyɛ den sɛ wobɛkenkan bere a fon nni wo nsam, ɛnyɛ den sɛ wobɛyɛ w’ade na woasan abɔ wɔ amanneɛbɔ ahorow ho. wobetumi ahyɛ no sɛ ɛbɛkyerɛ amanneɛbɔ bere a mfiri screen no adum na nso de nsa atrɛw amanneɛbɔ supɔw no mu akɔ fullscreen mode bere a mfiri screen no ayɛ adwuma
Esiane sɛ wɔyɛ wɔn ade wɔ amanneɛbɔ ahorow ho a wɔnkenkan emu nsɛm nti
Preview nhyehyeɛ sesa sɔ Dynamic Notification hwɛ
Frɛ tebea nkutoo (frɛ/ɔnfrɛ), a wunnim ɔfrɛ no ho nsɛm, na woakwati accedintal touches bere a worefrɛ telefon so
"- Accessibility Overlay : enti sɛ wonya amanneɛbɔ bi, bere a screen no yɛ adwuma a, saa dwumadie yi bɛtwetwe preview bar ketewa bi sɛ ticker a ɛbɛn camera cutout, amanneɛbɔ ho nsɛm wɔ mu. "
Haptic feedback (wosow bere a woka wo) .
Sɛ wotoa so a, wopene yɛn
Fa (mfonini nkutoo) style di dwuma ma charging, nnwom ne ringer events
Progressive ring kyerɛ sɛ battery no rebɔ
Kanea a ɛyɛ ahabammono a ɛrehyerɛn atwa mfoninitwa afiri tokuru ho ahyia
Kanea kɔkɔɔ a ɛrehyerɛn atwa mfoninitwa afiri tokuru ho ahyia
Nkɔso ring kyerɛ mprempren battery level
Kyerɛ battery tebea indecator onlu bere a ɛwɔ launcher screen so
So wo nfono wo wɔ atetesɛm amanneɛbɔ nhyehyɛe a ɛwɔ android so no ho?!
Trɛw mu ankasa bere a worekyerɛ bere a screen no adum no
Ayamye mu, fa app no ​​toto ho
Nkwa nna nyinaa mu kwan a wɔfa so nya
Hwɛ Nkrasɛm a Wɔkra no So
Sɛ ɛba sɛ amanneɛbɔ ne/anaasɛ nsɛm pii si a
Kyerɛ Dynamic Notification a ɛkyerɛ nnwom a wɔrebɔ
No Items available, yɛsrɛ wo san sɔ hwɛ bio.
Wɔanboaboa ɔdefoɔ data biara ano anaa wɔakyekyɛ sɛdeɛ wɔabɔ ho dawuro wɔ Google Play store -> app krataafa yi -> Data Safety.
Mma nkyerɛ mu bere a screen no wɔ landscape mode mu
Mma nnyɛ adwuma bere a screen no wɔ landscape mode mu
App no ​​nni Intanɛt kwan, enti wo data nkɔ baabiara, wubetumi ahwɛ ahu sɛ saa asɛm yi fi app info -> kwan, wɔ google play anaasɛ long click app icon.

Saa afiri yi nni mfoninitwa afiri tokuru. Nanso, woda so ara betumi de nneɛma a ɛma wotumi ne afoforo di nkitaho adi dwuma denam wo nsa a wobɛka screen no atifi mfinimfini te sɛ nea mfoninitwa afiri no tokuru bi wɔ hɔ no so
Fa nhyehyɛe a ɛkɔ akyiri di dwuma
Sɛ camera cutout no nyɛ tokuru a
Sɛ automatic detection of camera hole nyɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ a wubetumi ayɛ nsakrae wɔ (kɛse ne beae) ɔfã
Wunhia nkyerɛkyerɛmu ma saa nhyehyɛe yi
Coloring amanneɛbɔ preview twa camera cutout ho hyia
System Settings -> Accessibility -> nnwuma a wɔama/wɔahyɛ mu -> Dynamic Notification Helper
Fa camera cutout di dwuma de hwɛ amanneɛbɔ a woagye no wɔ ɔkwan soronko ne adebɔ kwan so
System Settings -> Accessibility -> nnwuma a wɔama/wɔahyɛ mu -> Dynamic Notification
System Settings -> Accessibility -> nnwuma a wɔama/wɔahyɛ mu -> Dynamic Notification
Bere biako a wɔde ma! 50% na wɔabɔ ho ban!
Nya NotiGuy nkwa nna nyinaa premium ma bo no fã.
-> Checkbox a edi kan no nkutoo na ɛho hia
Bue App no ​​na woayɛ no foforo
Wɔde ahyɛ mfinimfini wɔ screen no ase (nsa a wɔbɛtrɛw mu bio!) .
Nea ɛne mfoninitwa afiri no tokuru no wɔ abusuabɔ
Screen nifa ano (ɛfata ma mini style : IMAGE ONLY)
Wɔatetew mu, wɔ mfoninitwa afiri tokuru nkyɛn
Ntrɛwmu a edi mũ ne ne sorokɔ nyinaa a ɛwɔ status bar no mu
Wɔde asi mfinimfini wɔ mfoninitwa afiri no tokuru no mu
Prepearing for first use, yɛsrɛ wo san sɔ hwɛ bio wɔ sikani kakraa bi akyi.
18 + adwuma ma mfoninitwa afiri tokuru touch
Kyerɛ bere a screen no adum anaasɛ ɛwɔ system AOD mu
Display a wɔde charge ne nnwom
Sɛ wobɛkae wo amanneɛbɔ a wɔasɛn no mprempren, bere a screen no yɛ On no, san kyerɛ supɔw no %1$s sekan biara
Sesa nhyehyɛe no ti kɔ soro

NSƐM A ƐHO HIA: sɛ wowɔ app foforo a ɛte saa ara, bɔ mmɔden sɛ wobɛsiw notifications pop-up ano na adi nkogu... ɛbɛka saa app yi na ama no nso adi nkogu, enti yɛsrɛ wo ansa na woasɔ ahwɛ no, gyae saa ade no wɔ app afoforo mu, sɛ ɛwɔ hɔ a. anaasɛ wobɛma thier Notification Listener no ayɛ adwuma
Hyɛ no nsow: wɔ samsung so no app no ​​betumi asie amanneɛbɔ pop-up nanso entumi nsie samsung tiawa bar enti yɛsrɛ wo hyehyɛ amanneɛbɔ nhyehyɛe to Detailed wɔ nhyehyɛe nhyehyɛe mu -> amanneɛbɔ
Kyerɛ Dynamic Notification nkutoo a wonkyerɛ notification no mfitiase pop up no.
Mma nkyerɛ bere a screen no wɔ landscape mu
Display tiawa animated icon gyina hɔ ma ringer mode foforo no
Kyerɛ Dynamic Notification bere a wowɔ amanneɛbɔ (nsɛm a esisi) na screen no yɛ
- sɛ ɛbɛyɛ adwuma bere a wɔadum screen no, ɛsɛ sɛ Device nya ɔkwan a wɔfa so tow, anyɛ yiye koraa no (swipe to unlock) anaasɛ Always On Display Enabled
- sɛ amanneɛbɔ bi a wonyae bere a na screen no ayɛ adwuma, na app no ​​daa no adi a, ɛrenkyerɛ bio bere a screen no adum efisɛ wunim dedaw sɛ wowɔ bi.
Wɔbɛhyɛ amanneɛbɔ bi agyirae sɛnea wohu bere a wode nsa atrɛw mu, ayɛ ketewaa anaasɛ woabɔ amanneɛbɔ a wɔatrɛw mu no, woabɔ amanneɛbɔ a wɔatew so no anaasɛ woapo amanneɛbɔ ankasa no nkutoo.
Sɛ na %1$s Always On Display no On a, kyerɛ dynamic Notification wɔ mu
Saa ara na sɛnea mfoninitwa afiri no tokuru kɛse te
Saa ara na ɛte sɛ statusbar.
Ne kɛse ne baabi a wɔde besisi
Wɔde ntade foforo bɛka ho wɔ daa no so

Wo nkrataahyɛ no bɛyɛ foforo wɔ wo ho na wobegye sika a wɔakyerɛ wɔ atifi hɔ no afe anaa ɔsram biara (a wopaw) kosi sɛ wobɛtwa wo nkrataahyɛ mu ansa na bere a na woakyerɛw wo din saa bere no aba awiei. ebia wobɛhwɛ nkrataahyɛ so na woadum auto renewal afi Google Play akontaabu nhyehyɛe mu. na efi saa app yi home page -> ( Manage Subscription ) button no so
Swipe benkum anaa nifa beyi preview of notification no afi hɔ na ɛnyɛ notification ankasa no. na sɛ ɛba sɛ amanneɛbɔ pii wɔ hɔ a, wɔbɛda nea edi hɔ adi
Sɔ saa kwan yi hwɛ simma 5 kwa
Di kan wie nhyehyɛe, na hwɛ hu sɛ wɔama tumi krataa a wɔhwehwɛ no ayɛ adwuma, afei klik sɔhwɛ so na fi simma 5 sɔhwɛ bere ase.
Mfiase no yɛ test Auto detect
Wubetumi asɔ premium style ahwɛ ansa na woatɔ. fa preview button (ani ahyɛnsode) di dwuma .
Fa sie kosi sɛ wɔbɛkenkan amanneɛbɔ no anaasɛ wɔbɛtwa mu
Sɛ obi de ne nsa ka obi pɛnkoro a, ebetumi ama obi de ne nsa aka obi wɔ akwanhyia mu!
Nnansa sɔhwɛ bere a wontua hwee
Anaasɛ toa so de nea anohyeto wom di dwuma

"- a wode wo ho ama dwumadie ma nkitahodi kamera tokuru. - nneɛma a ɛkɔ akyiri. - tumi a wode hyehyɛ dwumadie a wɔatew mu ama nsa biako, klike mprenu, ka tenten, swipe kɔ nifa na swip kɔ benkum. - gyina kwan baako pɛ so."
Pocket Mode, Bu w’ani gu touches so bere a wowɔ lock screen so

Dɛn nti na premium? eyi faa yɛn adwumaden denneennen features te sɛ replacing system notifications pop up na yɛma dynamic notification height yɛ pɛ camera hole height yɛ exclusive to this app no ​​app biara wɔ play store betumi ayɛ eyi a apps a ɛte saa ara ka ho anka styling ne coloring
